title: mellytinker
author: mellytinker
content: if you have reddit with karma hit me up on discord ill pay you daily zaparus#7212

comments.author: AZMAINE
comments.created_time: August 26, 2022, 02:44:36 AMLast edit: August 26, 2022, 04:28:11 AM by AZMAINE
comments.body: Kindly dm me on telegram. I have experience to work. My tg username: @mrazmaine

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: mellytinker on August 26, 2022, 02:29:48 AMif you have reddit with karma hit me up on discord ill pay you daily zaparus#7212What minimum karma is expected from accounts?Also can you share more details about your business, even if you offer solid patments rate, ot does not mean mandatory as desirable job.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: I have 2yrs old reddit account with 2K+ Karma. I’m interested to do this job but you should include the details on how many post do you need per day and what kind of channel you want to create those post. The daily pay rate is good if this will be 2 to 4 post per day on a normal channel that doesn’t involved any referral link for an investment site.I don’t have discord. I will just PM you once you provide details I’m asking.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: mellytinker on August 26, 2022, 02:29:48 AMif you have reddit with karma hit me up on discord ill pay you daily zaparus#7212You need to give more details such as the age of the account, the required karma, the nature of the work with the number of daily posts, is it personal or does it include promoting a specific thing, and whether it is compatible with Reddit TOS and legal.Also, if you do not intend to pay with Bitcoin, this is not the right board.

comments.author: Hodoor
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on August 26, 2022, 04:45:30 PMQuote from: mellytinker on August 26, 2022, 02:29:48 AMif you have reddit with karma hit me up on discord ill pay you daily zaparus#7212You need to give more details such as the age of the account, the required karma, the nature of the work with the number of daily posts, is it personal or does it include promoting a specific thing, and whether it is compatible with Reddit TOS and legal.Also, if you do not intend to pay with Bitcoin, this is not the right board.It's probably promotional (likely for a shady business) otherwise he will just to it himself and not need to pay someone else. I have seen a lot of these guys showing up on the service board lately, where it's always a new account "hiring" forum members to do simple tasks for money. Needless to say, they provide vague details and never reply to the members intrested in taking the offer. I don't know why they do these, but it's something to keep an eye on for sure.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: I'd love to know more details and I'm asking the same questions that are being asked above. OP, if you're really interested, please do answer or add those details.

comments.author: john1010
comments.created_time: September 01, 2022, 06:27:25 AMLast edit: September 01, 2022, 06:45:16 AM by john1010
comments.body: Quote from: mellytinker on August 26, 2022, 02:29:48 AMif you have reddit with karma hit me up on discord ill pay you daily zaparus#7212I can't find your discord username, can you please add your discord profile link here, or create a discord channel for your offer. Or it is much better you drop all the info's here, since many of the people here want to process all the talks and transaction inside this forum. I am interested because i have 300 plus karma in my reddit, I think that is good enough for your offer.Edit:I already found you and sent you a friend request.

comments.body: Quote from: mellytinker on August 26, 2022, 02:29:48 AMif you have reddit with karma hit me up on discord ill pay you daily zaparus#7212I have 4 years old reddit account with 17k karma,if you add more details in your post than people esaily your post. Anyway i will dm your Discord.
